meanings.definition: The act or process of combining separate parts into a single unit.
meanings.sent1: The unitization of the puzzle pieces made completing the picture easier.
meanings.sent2: The unitization of the ingredients in the recipe ensured a delicious outcome.
meanings.sent3: The unitization of the toys in the playroom led to a tidy and organized space.
meanings.sent4: The unitization of the team's efforts resulted in a successful project completion.
meanings.sent5: The unitization of the colors in the painting created a harmonious composition.

meanings.definition: The organization of a group of assets or properties into a single entity for management or investment purposes.
meanings.sent1: The unitization of the company's resources streamlined operations.
meanings.sent2: The unitization of the funds allowed for better financial planning.
meanings.sent3: The unitization of the books on the shelf made it easier to find a specific title.
meanings.sent4: The unitization of the land parcels simplified the real estate development process.
meanings.sent5: The unitization of the tools in the toolbox improved efficiency during the project.
